translated: manifestation of cessation, and cultivation of the path,ğŸ”½then the four fruits would exist.ğŸ”½If the four fruits did not exist, then the four noble persons who abide in the fruits would not exist.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na 'phags pa'i gang zag zhugs pa bzhi po dag kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na 'phags pa'i gang zag zhugs pa bzhi po dag kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And if they did not exist, then the four noble persons who enter the fruits would not exist.

original: 'dir skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa'i snga rol gyi shes pa dang / bzod pa'i skad cig ma bcva lnga gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'dir skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa'i snga rol gyi shes pa dang / bzod pa'i skad cig ma bcva lnga gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
translated: Here, the cognition that is prior to the subsequent cognition of the truth of the path, which is the sixteenth moment, and the fifteen moments of acceptance are as follows.

original: khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal mngon par rtogs pa de'i tshe sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i bzod pa dang / shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal mngon par rtogs pa de'i tshe sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i bzod pa dang / shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: When one realizes the truth of suffering of the three realms, there are four moments of acceptance and knowledge that focus on suffering.

original: de la khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal mngon par rtogs pa'i dus kyi bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal mngon par rtogs pa'i dus kyi bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four moments of acceptance and knowledge that realize the truth of suffering of the three realms?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows.ğŸ”½The four moments of acceptance and knowledge that focus on the truth of suffering of the desire realm are the four moments of acceptance and knowledge that focus on the truth of suffering of the desire realm.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin pa dang log par lta ba dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / the tshom dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin pa dang log par lta ba dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / the tshom dang /
translated: The four moments of acceptance and knowledge that focus on the truth of suffering of the form realm are the four moments of acceptance and knowledge that focus on the truth of suffering of the form realm.ğŸ”½The four moments of acceptance and knowledge that focus on the truth of suffering of the formless realm are the four moments of acceptance and knowledge that focus on the truth of suffering of the formless realm.

original: 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa zhes bya ba phra rgyas bcu'i gnyen por gyur cing /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa zhes bya ba phra rgyas bcu'i gnyen por gyur cing /
translated: The antidote to the ten negative tendencies, such as attachment, anger, pride, and ignorance.

original: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam par skyes pa /
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam par skyes pa /
translated: It arises in the aspects of impermanence, suffering, emptiness, and selflessness.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
translated: It is the path of no obstacles that focuses on the truth of suffering in the desire realm.

original: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go //
translated: The moment of perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering is the first moment.

original: dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The moment of Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering is the second moment. It has the same focal object and aspect and is the path of liberation.

original: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la dmigs pa /ğŸ”½khong khro @159a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la dmigs pa / khong khro @159a * //
translated: Similarly, it focuses on the truth of suffering in the form and formless realms.

original: ma gtogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i phra rgyas bco brgyad kyi gnyen por gyur cing /
analyzed: ma gtogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i phra rgyas bco brgyad kyi gnyen por gyur cing /
translated: It is the antidote to the eighteen negative tendencies just explained, except for anger.

original: sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rnam par skyes pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
analyzed: sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rnam par skyes pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
translated: The third moment is the path of seeing, which is the uninterrupted path characterized as the arising of the aspect of the truth of suffering.ğŸ”½The fourth moment is the path of release characterized as possessing the same focal object and aspect as the subsequent perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of suffering.

original: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa'o //ğŸ”½dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /ğŸ”½sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gsum pa'o // dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: The four moments of perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of suffering and the knowledge of the truth of suffering are the path of seeing.ğŸ”½The four moments of perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of origin and the knowledge of the truth of origin are the path of seeing.ğŸ”½The four moments of perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of cessation and the knowledge of the truth of cessation are the path of seeing.ğŸ”½The four moments of perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of the path and the knowledge of the truth of the path are the path of seeing.ğŸ”½The four moments of perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of suffering and the knowledge of the truth of suffering are the path of seeing.ğŸ”½The four moments of perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of origin and the knowledge of the truth of origin are the path of seeing.ğŸ”½The four moments of perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of cessation and the knowledge of the truth of cessation are the path of seeing.

original: khams gsum na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: khams gsum na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa dang / bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du /
translated: The four moments of perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of the path and the knowledge of the truth of the path are the path of seeing.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung mthong bas spang par bya ba log par lta ba dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / the tshom dang / 'dod chags dang / khong khro dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa zhes bya ba phra rgyas bdun gyi gnyen por gyur cing /ğŸ”½rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skyes ba dang rkyen gyis rnam par skyes pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung gi bden pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung mthong bas spang par bya ba log par lta ba dang / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / the tshom dang / 'dod chags dang / khong khro dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa zhes bya ba phra rgyas bdun gyi gnyen por gyur cing / rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skyes ba dang rkyen gyis rnam par skyes pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung gi bden pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go //
translated: The antidote to the seven negative tendencies of the desire realm that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of origin: wrong view, extreme view, clinging to rules and ritual as supreme, attachment, anger, pride and ignorance.ğŸ”½The moment of perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of origin is the path of no obstacles that is the antidote to the seven negative tendencies of the desire realm that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of origin. It is the truth of origin that is the focal object and its aspects are its cause, origin, strong generation, condition and full generation.

original: dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The moment of Dharma knowledge of the truth of origin is the path of liberation that is the antidote to the seven negative tendencies of the desire realm that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of origin. It is the truth of origin that is the focal object and its aspects are its cause, origin, strong generation, condition and full generation.

original: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung gi bden pa la dmigs pa khong khro ba ma gtogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i phra rgyas bcu gnyis kyi gnyen por gyur cing /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i kun 'byung gi bden pa la dmigs pa khong khro ba ma gtogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i phra rgyas bcu gnyis kyi gnyen por gyur cing /
translated: So too, the third moment is the perseverance for subsequent knowledge of the truth of origin that is the antidote to the twelve negative tendencies just explained, except for anger, which focuses on the truth of origin that is the object field of the desire realm.

original: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam par skyes pa /
analyzed: kun 'byung gi bden pa'i rnam par skyes pa /
translated: It is generated in the aspect of the truth of origin.ğŸ”½It is characterized by the uninterrupted path.

original: khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po 'di dag / ji ltar @159b yin pa de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun 'byung la bshad pa phra
analyzed: khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po 'di dag / ji ltar @159b yin pa de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun 'byung la bshad pa phra
translated: The moment of subsequent knowledge of the truth of origin is the antidote to the seven aspects of the truth of origin to be abandoned by seeing the truth of origin in the desire realm.

original: rgyas bdun gyi gnyen por gyur zhing 'gog pa dang / zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par skyes pa /
analyzed: rgyas bdun gyi gnyen por gyur zhing 'gog pa dang / zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par skyes pa /
translated: It arises in the aspects of cessation, peace, excellence, and definite emergence.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la dmigs pa bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma ni gcig go //
translated: The moment of perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of cessation that focuses on the truth of cessation of the suffering of the desire realm is the uninterrupted path.

original: dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
analyzed: dmigs pa dang rnam pa de kho na dang ldan pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid can /
translated: It has the same focal object and aspect as the former.

original: sdug bsngal 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i skad cig ma ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The moment of Dharma knowledge of the truth of cessation is the liberated path.

translated: The truth of suffering in the desire realm is the focal object of the six secondary afflictions.ğŸ”½The truth of origin in the desire realm is the focal object of the six secondary afflictions.ğŸ”½The truth of cessation in the desire realm is the focal object of the six secondary afflictions.ğŸ”½The truth of path in the desire realm is the focal object of the six secondary afflictions.ğŸ”½The truth of suffering in the form realm is the focal object of eleven secondary afflictions, excluding anger.ğŸ”½The truth of origin in the form realm is the focal object of eleven secondary afflictions, excluding anger.ğŸ”½The truth of cessation in the form realm is the focal object of eleven secondary afflictions, excluding anger.ğŸ”½The truth of path in the form realm is the focal object of eleven secondary afflictions, excluding anger.ğŸ”½The truth of suffering in the formless realm is the focal object of eleven secondary afflictions, excluding anger.ğŸ”½The truth of origin in the formless realm is the focal object of eleven secondary afflictions, excluding anger.ğŸ”½The truth of cessation in the formless realm is the focal object of twelve secondary afflictions, excluding anger.ğŸ”½The truth of path in the formless realm is the focal object of twelve secondary afflictions, excluding anger.ğŸ”½

translated: and is characterized as the path of liberation.ğŸ”½These four moments are the moments of direct realization of the truth of the cessation of suffering in the three realms.

translated: The four moments of the truth of the pathğŸ”½The fifth moment is the path of seeing, which has the same object and aspect as the third moment,ğŸ”½and is characterized as the path of no obstacles.ğŸ”½The sixth moment is the path of liberation, which has the same object and aspect as the fifth moment,ğŸ”½and is characterized as the path of liberation.ğŸ”½The seventh moment is the path of no obstacles, which has the same object and aspect as the fifth moment,ğŸ”½and is characterized as the path of no obstacles.ğŸ”½The eighth moment is the path of liberation, which has the same object and aspect as the seventh moment,ğŸ”½and is characterized as the path of liberation.ğŸ”½These four moments are the moments of direct realization of the truth of the path.
